actions.message:
```
f?Help                   właśnie tej komendy użyłeś :)
f?info-ludzi             Displays the user's information
f?kanal                  informacje o kanale
f?rola [nazwa roli]      info o roli
f?uderz [@user]          uderza użytkownika
f?FlipCoin               orzeł albo reszka: który wypadnie?
f?GenNumber [min] [max]  losuje numery
f?zloto                  pokazuje ile użytkownik ma monet greckich
f?Gamble                 zarabianie albo tracenie monet greckich
```
actions.name: Send Message

```
Insert a role name to get info about it:
!RoleInfo [role-name]
```

```
napisz minimalną i maksymalną liczbę do losowania:
f?losowanie [minimum] [maximum]
```

actions.message: nie wygrałeś ani nie przegrałeś żadnych monet greckich...

{
  "name": "ostrzezenia",
  "permissions": "NONE",
  "restriction": "1",
  "actions": [
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "permission": "KICK_MEMBERS",
      "iftrue": "2",
      "iftrueVal": "11",
      "iffalse": "0",
      "iffalseVal": "9",
      "name": "Check Member Permissions"
    },
    {
      "server": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "1",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "id",
      "name": "Store Server Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "16",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "imgurl",
      "name": "Store Member Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "7",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "name",
      "name": "Store Member Things"
    },
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "dataName": "${tempVars(\"id\")}.warnings",
      "defaultVal": "0",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "warnings",
      "name": "Store Member Data"
    },
    {
      "title": "",
      "author": "${tempVars(\"name\")}",
      "color": "#FF0000",
      "timestamp": "true",
      "url": "",
      "authorIcon": "${tempVars(\"imgurl\")}",
      "imageUrl": "",
      "thumbUrl": "",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "send",
      "name": "Create Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "send",
      "fieldName": "● Ilość ostrzeżeń",
      "message": "${tempVars(\"warnings\")}",
      "inline": "0",
      "name": "Add Embed Field"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "send",
      "message": "Ostrzeżenia z",
      "footerIcon": "",
      "name": "Set Embed Footer"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "send",
      "channel": "0",
      "varName2": "",
      "name": "Send Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "name": "End Action Sequence"
    },
    {
      "condition": "1",
      "comparison": "0",
      "value": "1",
      "iftrue": "0",
      "iftrueVal": "",
      "iffalse": "2",
      "iffalseVal": "2",
      "name": "Check Parameters"
    },
    {
      "server": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "1",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "id",
      "name": "Store Server Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "16",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "imgurl",
      "name": "Store Member Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "7",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "name",
      "name": "Store Member Things"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "dataName": "${tempVars(\"id\")}.warnings",
      "defaultVal": "0",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "warnings",
      "name": "Store Member Data"
    },
    {
      "title": "",
      "author": "Ostrzeżenia użytkownika: ${tempVars(\"name\")}",
      "color": "#FF0000",
      "timestamp": "true",
      "url": "",
      "authorIcon": "${tempVars(\"imgurl\")}",
      "imageUrl": "",
      "thumbUrl": "",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "send",
      "name": "Create Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "send",
      "fieldName": "● Ilość ostrzeżeń",
      "message": "${tempVars(\"warnings\")}",

    },
    {

    {

    }
  ],
  "_id": "sPvqW"
}
actions.name: Run Script

actions.code:
"name": "ostrzez",
  "permissions": "NONE",
  "restriction": "1",
  "_id": "jsexV",
  "actions": [
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "permission": "KICK_MEMBERS",
      "iftrue": "3",
      "iftrueVal": "5",
      "iffalse": "0",
      "iffalseVal": "",
      "name": "Check Member Permissions"
    },
    {
      "title": "",
      "author": "",
      "color": "#FF0000",
      "timestamp": "false",
      "url": "",
      "authorIcon": "",
      "imageUrl": "",
      "thumbUrl": "",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "permsembed",
      "name": "Create Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "permsembed",
      "message": "**Błąd:** Brak uprawnień.",
      "name": "Set Embed Description"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "permsembed",
      "message": "Chyba nie masz uprawnień :(",
      "footerIcon": "",
      "name": "Set Embed Footer"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "permsembed",
      "channel": "0",
      "varName2": "",
      "storage3": "0",
      "varName3": "",
      "name": "Send Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "name": "End Action Sequence"
    },
    {
      "condition": "1",
      "comparison": "0",
      "value": "1",
      "iftrue": "3",
      "iftrueVal": "4",
      "iffalse": "0",
      "iffalseVal": "",
      "name": "Check Parameters"
    },
    {
      "title": "",
      "author": "",
      "color": "#55FF00",
      "timestamp": "false",
      "url": "",
      "authorIcon": "",
      "imageUrl": "",
      "thumbUrl": "",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embedinformacje",
      "name": "Create Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embedinformacje",
      "message": "Chcesz dać warna użytkownikowi?\n**Wpisz:** `!ostrzez *@user* *(powod)*`",
      "name": "Set Embed Description"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embedinformacje",
      "channel": "0",
      "varName2": "",
      "storage3": "0",
      "varName3": "",
      "name": "Send Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "name": "End Action Sequence"
    },
    {
      "server": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "1",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "id",
      "name": "Store Server Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "dataName": "${tempVars(\"id\")}.warnings",
      "defaultVal": "0",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "warnings",
      "name": "Store Member Data"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "16",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "img",
      "name": "Store Member Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "3",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "name",
      "name": "Store Member Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "7",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "menusertag",
      "name": "Store Member Things"
    },
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "7",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "authusertag",
      "name": "Store Member Things"
    },
    {
      "member": "1",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "16",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "img2",
      "name": "Store Member Info"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "7",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "username",
      "name": "Store Member Things"
    },
    {
      "server": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "info": "2",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName2": "server",
      "name": "Store Server Info"
    },
    {
      "info": "2",
      "infoIndex": "1",
      "storage": "2",
      "varName": "user",
      "name": "Store Command Params"
    },
    {
      "info": "1",
      "infoIndex": "2",
      "storage": "2",
      "varName": "reason",
      "name": "Store Command Params"
    },
    {
      "title": "",
      "author": "Dodano Ostrzeżenie!",

      "timestamp": "true",
      "url": "",
      "authorIcon": "${tempVars(\"img\")}",
      "imageUrl": "",
      "thumbUrl": "",
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embed-info",
      "name": "Create Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embed-info",
      "fieldName": "●  Użytkownik",
      "message": "${tempVars(\"menusertag\")}",
      "inline": "0",
      "name": "Add Embed Field"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embed-info",
      "fieldName": "●  Nadający",
      "message": "${tempVars(\"authusertag\")}",
      "inline": "0",
      "name": "Add Embed Field"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embed-info",
      "fieldName": "●  Powód",
      "message": "${serverVars(\"reason\")}",
      "inline": "0",
      "name": "Add Embed Field"
    },
    {
      "storage": "1",
      "varName": "embed-info",
      "channel": "0",
      "varName2": "reported",
      "storage3": "0",
      "varName3": "",
      "name": "Send Embed Message"
    },
    {
      "member": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "dataName": "${tempVars(\"id\")}.warnings",
      "changeType": "1",
      "value": "1",
      "name": "Control Member Data"
    },
    {
      "storage": "0",
      "varName": "",
      "name": "Delete Message"
    }
  ],
  "comType": "0"
}
actions.name: Run Script
